name: Ch17BBaseConvo2
_source: speak;Joshua;So, Rennac... care to try your luck?|I've heard you've been making quite a profit lately.
speak;Rennac;That depends.|What kind of game did you have in mind?|And more importantly, what are the stakes?
speak;Joshua;Simple enough.|I'll flip this coin.|You call it in the air.
speak;Rennac;A coin toss?|Really, Joshua?|I expected something more... sophisticated from the gambling prince.
speak;Joshua;Sometimes the simplest games are the most revealing.|Besides, I've got a special wager in mind.
speak;Joshua;If I win, you'll tell me where you've hidden that rare Jehanna gemstone|you've been so secretive about.
speak;Rennac;What?|How did you...?|I mean, what gemstone?
speak;Joshua;Come now, Rennac.|We both know what you took from the Jehanna treasure vaults.|I'm just curious where you've stashed it.
speak;Joshua;My mother's ring.|Pure Jehannan gold with a desert ruby.|Worth more than that gemstone, I'd wager.
speak;Rennac;Now that is interesting.|Very well, I accept.|But I choose the stakes.
speak;Rennac;Even.|I've always found balance brings good fortune.
speak;Joshua;Even!|Luck smiles upon me once again.
speak;Joshua;Be my guest.|You'll find nothing amiss.
speak;Rennac;This is ridiculous!|How do you always manage to win these bets?
speak;Joshua;Some call it luck.|Others call it fate.|Either way, I believe you owe me some information.
speak;Rennac;Fine.|The gemstone is hidden in the false bottom of my travel chest.|Satisfied?
speak;Joshua;Very.|Don't worry, your secret is safe with me.
speak;Rennac;I should have known better than to gamble with you.|What will it take to keep you quiet about this?
speak;Joshua;Buy me a drink and we'll call it even.|For now, at least.
speak;Joshua;So I've been told.|Barkeep! Your finest ale for two weary travelers!
speak;Rennac;I'll get you back for this, Joshua.|Mark my words.
speak;Joshua;I look forward to it.|Life's always more interesting with a challenge.
speak;Joshua;Odd!|Well, would you look at that...
speak;Rennac;Perhaps your legendary luck is finally running dry.|Now, about that ring...
speak;Rennac;My, my... it's even more beautiful up close.|The craftsmanship is exquisite.
speak;Joshua;It's been in my family for generations.|Take good care of it.
speak;Rennac;Oh, I intend to.|By selling it to the highest bidder!|Just kidding, just kidding!
speak;Rennac;Relax, gambling man.|I'm no fool.|I know better than to cross Jehanna royalty.
speak;Rennac;Tell you what—I'll hold onto this as collateral.|Win it back from me in our next game.
speak;Joshua;You're on.|Double or nothing next time.
speak;Rennac;I wouldn't have it any other way.|Drinks are on me tonight.|To celebrate my rare victory!
speak;Joshua;Enjoy it while it lasts.|Lady Luck is fickle, friend.
speak;Rennac;So are thieves and rogues, Joshua.|So are thieves and rogues.
